moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 h6 4. cxd5: White wants to obtain a position choking attack
moves.5... Bb4 6. a3 Ba5 7. b4 Bb6: The aim is to attract defense pawns in the advanced position to block other pieces
moves.8. e3 Nf6 9. Bd3 O-O 10. h3 Re8 11. Nf3: Bishops exchange is only an advantage for black
moves.14. Bxc7 Qxc7 15. Rfc1 Re7: The aim is to block the white bishop and pawns to immobilize
